text: @realDonaldTrump Unfortunately you screwed up everything & it will take 10 years to recover. Don’t use this to get re-elected. We’re not that stupid, we certainly know if we don’t have a paycheck or a job. The Covid-19 is going to return given the unrest you fuel everyday!
